info.description: Use this API to view and manage requests.
info.title: request

tags.name: requests
tags.description: Returns a collection of requests based on the specified parameters.

tags.name: types
tags.description: Returns a collection of requests types based on the specified parameters.

get.summary: Retrieves the request with the specified ID.
get.description: Retrieves the specified request, including the completed questionnaire associated to it. Returned results are secured based on the processing person's View access to the request. Secured by: Core Navigation Scope: Adaptive Planning for Financial Plans, Adaptive Planning for the Workforce, Tenant Non-Configurable

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of request types.
get.description: Returns all request types. The returned results are secured based on the processing person's Initiate access to the request. Call GET /types/{ID} to retrieve details about the questionnaire for the request type. Secured by: Core Navigation Scope: Adaptive Planning for Financial Plans, Adaptive Planning for the Workforce, Tenant Non-Configurable

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

post.description: Closes the specified request. In the request body, specify at least the required field: resolution. Security is evaluated based on the request event awaiting the processing person's action. Ensure that the user who submits this endpoint has View permission on the Workday Object specified on the workdayObjectValue request field, if included. To check the user permission on the object, see the View Security for Securable Item task in Workday. Secured by: Core Navigation Scope: Adaptive Planning for Financial Plans, Adaptive Planning for the Workforce, Tenant Non-Configurable

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

400.description:
Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
Error Code | Validation Message
--- | ---
A187 | Invalid request subtype.
A188 | You can't submit a comment because comments are disabled on this business process.
A189 | The Workday object value you provide must match the Workday object associated to this request type.
A212 | This event step is not awaiting your action.
A218 | You must specify a resolution.
A220 | Invalid resolution details.
A1703 | Specify a resolution that's active and configured for the request type.

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of in progress requests based on the specified parameters.
get.description: Returns a collection of in progress requests based on the specified parameters. Does not return the associated questionnaire response for each request. Returned results are secured based on the processing person's View access to the request. To retrieve Closed requests, specify the resolution as a parameter. Use prompting on the /requests resource to see the WIDs available for each parameter field. Secured by: Core Navigation Scope: Adaptive Planning for Financial Plans, Adaptive Planning for the Workforce, Tenant Non-Configurable

parameters.name: initiator
parameters.description: The WID for the person who initiated the request. You can GET /workers in the /common service to retrieve a worker's WID.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the person this request is being initiated on behalf of.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The ID of the request based on the ID generator format.

parameters.name: requestSubtype
parameters.description:
The Workday ID of the request subtype. You can specify more than 1 requestSubtype query parameter. 
You can call GET /requests/query/values/requestSubtype to retrieve a valid ID.

parameters.name: requestType
parameters.description:
The Workday ID of the request type. You can specify more than 1 requestType query parameter.
You can call GET /requests/query/values/requestType to retrieve a valid ID.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description:
The Workday ID of the resolution of the request. You can specify more than 1 resolution query parameter.
Valid values:

* 47fa99d9ed671000111f2f4d1d6f37ea - Done

* be256002ae2010000c0b9b59ca1d014b - Duplicate

* be256002ae2010000c0b9c817aea014c - Denied

* be256002ae2010000bfd6ae5ea5b0148 - Canceled

parameters.name: resolutionDetails
parameters.description:
The Workday ID of the resolution details. You can specify more than 1 resolutionDetails query parameter.
You can call GET /requests/query/values/resolutionDetails to retrieve a valid ID.

parameters.name: workdayObjectValue
parameters.description:
The Workday ID of the business object associated with the request. 
Call the corresponding GET endpoint on the business object resource in the appropriate REST service to get a valid ID.

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

post.description: Creates a request with the specified data. In the request body, specify the required field: requestType {id}. You can use a returned id from GET /types. Other fields will be required based on the specified request type. The Create Requests task in Workday shows the required fields for a specific request type and questionnaire. Secured by the processing person's Initiate access on the specified request type. Secured by: Core Navigation Scope: Adaptive Planning for Financial Plans, Adaptive Planning for the Workforce, Tenant Non-Configurable

400.description:
Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
Error Code | Validation Message
--- | ---
A188 | You can't submit a comment because comments are disabled on this business process.
A193 | You can't enter a description because it is hidden for this request type.
A194 | You must provide a request description.
A204 | You must provide a request type.
A210 | You don't have permissions to initiate a request of this type.
A213 | Questionnaire response is required for the request type.
A231 | Questionnaire submission is not allowed for the specified request type.
A1353 | Request type does not allow initiation on behalf of another person.
A1754 | You have submitted more than one answer for a single select multiple choice question.
A1755 | You have selected an invalid answer choice.
A1756 | This questionnaire has already been submitted. You can’t submit it again.
A1756 | This questionnaire has already been submitted. You can’t submit it again.
A1757 | This questionnaire is now closed. You can no longer submit new responses or change your existing responses.
A1758 | You cannot submit answers to branching questions without answers for parent questions.
A1759 | All answers you submit must match the expected format for that question type.
A1761 | All answered questions must be questions from the associated questionnaire.
A1764 | You must answer all required questions.
A1765 | You have submitted more multiple choice answers than is allowed for a question.

get.description: Retrieves the specified request type, including the business object and questionnaire details associated with the request type. Call this endpoint to get the information you need to create a request. Secured by: Core Navigation Scope: Adaptive Planning for Financial Plans, Adaptive Planning for the Workforce, Tenant Non-Configurable

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

field.description: The field related to the error

path.description: The path of the field related to the error

count.description: The number of instances returned by this facet
